title: Error 0xc0000005
body: i need help my legaue client when its about to get in a game it crashes and says this error 0xc0000005  "league of legends was unable to star correctly (0xc0000005) press ok to close app i need help to resolve this please {{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

When did this start occurring?
Do you have a system restore point from before this issue arose?
it started just today yesterday it was fine and no i dont unfortunately
Yes i've done that multiple times

What antivirus are you currently using?

Is the League install directory added as an exception in your AV? If not, please do and then [force a repatch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4).

Let me know if this helps,
Seph
